name: Pumpkin Death Garden
description: Action-packed bug shooting game! Grow your pumpkin patch ever larger by defending it from the swarms of insects! Try out guns to find your favourite. Shotgun, sniper rifle, or assault rifle? Each has a unique play style with pros and cons, and different mods to choose from as you level up.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 0.6 GHz or faster Memory: 100 MB RAM Graphics: 2 Gbps or faster (a low end graphics card will do) Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
